title.rendered: JOB POST: Junior Software Developer at TISS, Mumbai [Salary Rs 35k/Month]: Apply by July 16

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the post of Junior Software Developer at TISS, Mumbai. The last date of application is July 16, 2023.

About TISS

Tata Institute of Social Sciences (TISS) is a multi-campus public university in Mumbai, India. It is Asia’s oldest institute for professional social work education and was founded in 1936 in then Bombay Presidency of British India as the Sir Dorabji Tata Graduate School of Social Work by the Sir Dorabji Tata Trust.

Post Overview

Tata Institute of Social Sciences (TISS) invites interested candidates to apply for the post of Junior Software Developer to be filled on contract basis for a period of one year initially and extendable based on performance of the candidate and the requirement of the Institute.

Job Description

  • Handling of ERP at TISS
  • Creation of User id, password and Node setting.
  • Processing various kinds of leaves of employees (Teaching, NonTeaching and Project staff) i.e. Casual leave, Paid leave, Duty leave,
  • Vacation leave, Sick leave,Maternity leave, Paternity leave etc.
  • Processing monthly salary through ERP System.
  • Processing APAR of employees.
  • Handling technical issues at section in co-ordination with Computer Centre and IT Team.
  • Co-ordination with A/c section in processing salaries through ERP.
  • Co-ordination with Project leaders for handling project-ERP aspects.
  • Any other duties relating to handling ERP System.

Educational Qualification and Experience

  • A Masters’ degree in Computer Science / Computer Applications plus one years of work experience.
  • OR
  • Bachelors’ Degree in Engineering with specialization in Computer Science /Electronics and Communication /Information Technology from recognized University plus three years of work experience.

Salary

Rs. 35000 per month.

Application Fee

Application Fee of Rs 500/- to be paid online. Application fee for SC/ST/PWD candidates will be Rs 250/-, if they upload the required Certificate in the Online Application Form. Woman applicants are exempted from the payment of application fee. The application will be valid only on receipt of application fee for those who are required to pay. Fee once paid, shall not be refunded under any circumstances.

How to Apply?

Interested candidates can apply directly via this link.

Location

Mumbai Campus.

Deadline

16th July, 2023

Date of Interview

Last week of July 2023 (Tentative).

Click here to view the official notification for the post of Junior Software Developer at TISS, Mumbai.
